text: Arau mucha'i yetiya kraud'dha arau biksubdha hai nija sampradayara ocarata ubhati ahile, tetiya ka’le, ‘mora anupasthitita tomaloke mora kimana nikrsta pratinidhitba karaicha! Tomalokara pratipalakara adesara agate'i tomaloke kharakheda karailane’? E'i buli te'om phalakasamuha daliya'i pelale arau te'omra bhatrka culita dharai nijara pine tani aniba dharaile. Haraune ka’le, ‘he mora sahodara! Manuhe moka durbala buli bharaichila arau moka praaya hatya karai pela'ichila. Seye tumi mora lagata ene acarana nakaraiba yi karaile satrausakale anandita haya arau moka yalimasakalara antarbhukta buli nabharaiba’
